sameAnalysis.part_name: 这组名词都有"食物"之意。
means: food ： 普通常用词，泛指一切能充饥和补充人或动物身体消耗的食物。
provisions ： 指即时应用或储藏备用的食物或粮食。
diet ： 指规定的或惯常的食物，尤指维持健康的定量或定质食物，也指疗养时规定的食物。

word_mean: 饮食，食物：每人每日所摄取的常量饮食，尤指特殊设计以求适合个体具体需要的饮食，如列入或剔除某些食物

sentence.Network_en: It makes sense to eat a reasonably balanced diet when slimming.
sentence.Network_cn: 在减肥过程中保持饮食的营养相对均衡是明智的。

sentence.Network_en: The radio had fed him a diet of pop songs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从广播里听到的都是千篇一律的流行歌曲。

sentence.Network_en: Some cases of arthritis respond to a gluten-free diet.
sentence.Network_cn: 无麸质饮食对一些关节炎患者有疗效。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French diete (noun), dieter (verb), via Latin from Greek diaita 'a way of life'
late Middle English: from medieval Latin dieta 'day's work, wages, etc.', also 'meeting of councillors'

entry.def: Your diet is the type and range of food that you regularly eat.

example.ex: It's never too late to improve your diet.
example.tran: 什么时候改善饮食都为时不晚。

example.ex: ...a healthy diet rich in fruit and vegetables...
example.tran: 富含水果和蔬菜的健康饮食

entry.tran: (医生指定的)特别饮食，规定饮食
entry.def: If a doctor puts someone on a diet, he or she makes them eat a special type or range of foods in order to improve their health.

example.ex: He was put on a diet of milky food.
example.tran: 他按照医嘱要食用乳制品。

example.ex: ...a special diet for children with high cholesterol.
example.tran: 专为胆固醇高的孩子准备的特别饮食

entry.tran: （为减轻体重的）限制饮食，节食
entry.def: If you are on a diet, you eat special kinds of food or you eat less food than usual because you are trying to lose weight.

example.ex: Have you been on a diet? You've lost a lot of weight...
example.tran: 你最近在节食吗？你瘦了好多。

example.ex: Diet and exercise will alter your shape...
example.tran: 节食和锻炼会改变你的体形。

entry.tran: (为减轻体重而)限制饮食，节食
entry.def: If you are dieting, you eat special kinds of food or you eat less food than usual because you are trying to lose weight.

example.ex: I've been dieting ever since the birth of my fourth child...
example.tran: 我生完第四个孩子后就一直在节食。

example.ex: Most of us have dieted at some time in our lives.
example.tran: 我们大多数人都曾在人生的某个时期为减肥而节食过。

entry.tran: (饮料或食物)有助于减肥的，低热量的，低卡路里的
entry.def: Diet drinks or foods have been specially produced so that they do not contain many calories.

entry.tran: (尤指令人不快或劣质的东西的)大量
entry.def: If you are fed on a diet of something, especially something unpleasant or of poor quality, you receive or experience a very large amount of it.

example.ex: The radio had fed him a diet of pop songs...
example.tran: 他从广播里听到的都是千篇一律的流行歌曲。

example.ex: People are rejecting this constant diet of despair.
example.tran: 人们开始拒绝这种没完没了的绝望情绪。

means.word_mean: 2. a legislative assembly in certain countries (e.g., Japan)
3. the usual food and drink consumed by an organism (person or animal)
4. the act of restricting your food intake (or your intake of particular foods)
1. follow a regimen or a diet, as for health reasons;

sentences.sentence: "He has high blood pressure and must stick to a low-salt diet"

means.word_mean: 2. eat sparingly, for health reasons or to lose weight

auth_sentence.content: Review of their diet to check it's adequate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Review of their diet to check it's adequate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Review of their diet to check it's adequate.

auth_sentence.content: This diet should be followed in the long term.
auth_sentence.res_content: This diet should be followed in the long term.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This diet should be followed in the long term.

auth_sentence.content: Their diet consists mostly of krill and small fish.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their diet consists mostly of krill and small fish.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their diet consists mostly of krill and small fish.

Sentence.sentence: Many people now say the benefits of switching to vegetarian diet which excludes meat and fish.
However, some nutritionists advise against switching to a totally strict vegetarian diet
They believe such a diet which includes no products from animal sources can be deficient in many of the necessary vitamins and minerals our bodies need.

jushi.english: Noise pollution is a daily diet in big cities.
jushi.chinese: 在大城市,噪音污染是家常便饭。

jushi.english: My diet is made up of rice and vegetables.
jushi.chinese: 我日常的饮食包括米饭和蔬菜。

jushi.english: The doctor put me on a low-salt diet.
